classes.label: Barbarian
classes.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage.

classes.label: Bard
classes.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

classes.label: Cleric
classes.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

classes.label: Druid
classes.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature — moonlight and plant growth, fire and lightning — and adopting animal forms.

classes.label: Fighter
classes.description: A master of martial combat, skilled wita variety of weapons and armor.

classes.label: Monk
classes.description: An master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

classes.label: Paladin
classes.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.

classes.label: Ranger
classes.description: A warrior who uses martial prowess annature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization.

classes.label: Rogue
classes.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

classes.label: Sorcerer
classes.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

classes.label: Warlock
classes.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

classes.label: Wizard
classes.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.

statistics.label: Strength
statistics.description: Strength is being able to crush a tomato.

statistics.label: Dexterity
statistics.description: Dexterity is being able to dodge a tomato.

statistics.label: Constitution
statistics.description: Constitution is being able to eat a bad tomato.

statistics.label: Intelligence
statistics.description: Intelligence is knowing a tomato is a fruit.

statistics.label: Wisdom
statistics.description: Wisdom is knowing not to put a tomato in a fruit salad.

statistics.label: Charisma
statistics.description: Charisma is being able to sell a tomato based fruit salad.

target_methods.label: Multi-target
target_methods.description: Multiple targets are affected. Usually when clustered together.

target_methods.label: Area of Effect
target_methods.description: An area of a specific size and shape is affected. Every designated target inside is affected.

damage_types.label: Acid
damage_types.description: The corrosive spray of a black dragon's breath and the dissolving enzymes secreted by a black pudding deal acid damage.

damage_types.label: Bludgeoning
damage_types.description: Blunt force attacks—hammers, falling, constriction, and the like—deal bludgeoning damage.

damage_types.label: Cold
damage_types.description: The infernal chill radiating from an ice devil's spear and the frigid blast of a white dragon's breath deal cold damage.

damage_types.label: Fire
damage_types.description: Red dragons breathe fire, and many spells conjure flames to deal fire damage.

damage_types.label: Force
damage_types.description: Force is pure magical energy focused into a damaging form. Most effects that deal force damage are spells, including magic missile and spiritual weapon.

damage_types.label: Lightning
damage_types.description: A lightning bolt spell and a blue dragon's breath deal lightning damage.

damage_types.label: Necrotic
damage_types.description: Necrotic damage, dealt by certain undead and a spell such as chill touch, withers matter and even the soul.

damage_types.label: Piercing
damage_types.description: Puncturing and impaling attacks, including spears and monsters' bites, deal piercing damage.

damage_types.label: Poison
damage_types.description: Venomous stings and the toxic gas of a green dragon's breath deal poison damage.

damage_types.label: Psychic
damage_types.description: Mental abilities such as a mind flayer's psionic blast deal psychic damage.

damage_types.label: Radiant
damage_types.description: Radiant damage, dealt by a cleric's flame strike spell or an angel's smiting weapon, sears the flesh like fire and overloads the spirit with power.

damage_types.label: Slashing
damage_types.description: Swords, axes, and monsters' claws deal slashing damage.

damage_types.label: Thunder
damage_types.description: A concussive burst of sound, such as the effect of the Thunderwave spell, deals thunder damage.

magic_components.label: Verbal
magic_components.description: Most spells require the chanting of mystic words. The words themselves aren't the source of the spell's power; rather, the particular combination of sounds, with specific pitch and resonance, sets the threads of magic in motion. Thus, a character who is gagged or in an area of silence, such as one created by the **Silence** spell, can't cast a spell with a **Verbal** component.

magic_components.label: Somatic
magic_components.description: Spellcasting gestures might include a forceful gesticulation or an intricate set of gestures. If a spell requires a **Somatic** component, the caster must have free use of at least one hand to perform these gestures.

magic_components.label: Material
magic_components.description:
Casting some spells requires particular objects, specified in the component entry. A character can use a *Component pouch *or a *Spellcasting focus* in place of the components specified for a spell. But if a cost is indicated for a component, a character must have that specific component before he or she can cast the spell.

If a spell states that a material component is consumed by the spell, the caster must provide this component for each casting of the spell.
A spellcaster must have a hand free to access a spell's material components - or to hold a spellcasting focus - but it can be the same hand that he or she uses to perform somatic components.

magic_schools.label: Abjuration
magic_schools.description: Magic that blocks, banishes, or protects. Detractors of this school say that its tradition is about denial, negation rather than positive assertion. Others say that ending harmful effects, protecting the weak, and banishing evil influences is anything but a philosophical void.

magic_schools.label: Conjuration
magic_schools.description: Spells that produce objects and creatures out of thin air. Ranging from billowing clouds of killing fog or summon creatures from elsewhere to fight on your behalf.

magic_schools.label: Divination
magic_schools.description: Spells of discernment, remote viewing, supernatural knowledge, and foresight.

magic_schools.label: Enchantment
magic_schools.description: Abilities to magically entrance and beguile people and monsters.

magic_schools.label: Evocation
magic_schools.description: Magic that creates powerful elemental effects such as bitter cold, searing flame, rolling thunder, crackling lightning, and burning acid.

magic_schools.label: Illusion
magic_schools.description: Magic that dazzles the senses, befuddles the mind, and tricks even the wisest folk.

magic_schools.label: Necromancy
magic_schools.description: Concerns the cosmic forces of life, death, and undeath. Manipulates the energy that animates all living things.

magic_schools.label: Transmutation
magic_schools.description: Spells that modify energy and matter.

weapon_properties.label: Ammunition
weapon_properties.description: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield. If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon. A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

weapon_properties.label: Finesse
weapon_properties.description: When making an attack with a finesse weapon, you use your choice of your **Strength** or **Dexterity** modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.

weapon_properties.label: Heavy
weapon_properties.description: Small creatures have **Disadvantage** on attack rolls with heavy weapons. A heavy weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Small creature to use effectively.

weapon_properties.label: Light
weapon_properties.description: A light weapon is small and easy to handle. making it ideal for use when fighting with two weapons.

weapon_properties.label: Loading
weapon_properties.description: Because of the time required to load this weapon, you can fire only one piece of ammunition from it when you use an action, bonus action, or reaction to fire it, regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.

weapon_properties.label: Reach
weapon_properties.description: This weapon adds 5 feet to your reach when you attack with it.

weapon_properties.label: Ranged
weapon_properties.description: A weapon that can be used to make a ranged attack has a range shown in parentheses after the Ammunition or Thrown property. The range lists two numbers. The first is the weapon's normal range in feet, and the second indicates the weapon's maximum range. When attacking a target beyond normal range you have **Disadvantage** on the attack roll. You can't attack a target beyond the weapon's long range.

weapon_properties.label: Special
weapon_properties.description: A weapon with the special property has unusual rules governing its use, explained in the weapon's description.

weapon_properties.label: Thrown
weapon_properties.description: If a weapon has the thrown property, you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapon, you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For example, if you throw a handaxe, you use your **Strength**, but if you throw a dagger, you can use either your **Strength** or your **Dexterity**, since the dagger has the **Finesse** property.

weapon_properties.label: Two-Handed
weapon_properties.description: This weapon requires two hands to use.

weapon_properties.label: Versatile
weapon_properties.description: This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property - the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

items: 2 x Case for Maps and Scrolls
